    Threshold counts

    thresholdCounts.Rd

    Threshold dataframe to a given level and return number of barcodes meeting threshold in each sample.

    Usage

    thresholdCounts(df, threshold = 20, plot = FALSE)

    Arguments

    df

    Dataframe to be thresholded.

    threshold

    The threshold to use. Rows with count below this will be removed.

    plot

    Logical. Draw plots of dataset?

    Value

    Returns a thresholded data-frame

    Examples

    thresholdCounts(test.counts, threshold = 20, plot = FALSE)
#>     Sample Count

#> 2     T0-2  1334
#> 3    T0b-1  1282
